content:
New lineup delivers professional-grade performance to match any budget, ensuring the best cleaning 

possible for everyone.

NEW YORK, Aug. 7, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- , a smart home appliance company renowned for its ecosystem of innovative solutions, today introduced the — a comprehensive three-model lineup of robot vacuums designed to bring advanced cleaning technology to every household, regardless of budget. Furthering its commitment to strengthening its presence in the US market, Dreame continues to deliver innovative solutions tailored to American consumers' needs. The L40s Ultra, L40s Ultra AE, and L40s Ultra CE deliver professional-grade performance, ensuring the best cleaning possible.

With the global robot vacuum market expected to reach $7.3 billion by 2025, consumers are looking for the advanced cleaning technology Dreame is known for. The L40s Series addresses this growing need by offering three distinct entry points into premium robot vacuum performance, from first-time buyers to tech enthusiasts, without compromising on cleaning excellence.

"Next-gen cleaning technology should be for everyone," said Ana Wang, General Manager of Dreame Technology North America. "The L40s Series provides that for every consumer. Our diverse offering of state-of-the-art products welcomes more customers into the Dreame ecosystem while maintaining the innovation and performance standards that define our brand."

Three models of cleaning excellence

The L40s Series features graduated technology tiers that offer Dreame's trusted, proven cleaning prowess for any household:

L40s Ultra — More Power/Intelligent for You

The premium model delivers industry-leading 19,000Pa Vormax™ suction with breakthrough innovations for tech-savvy users and smart home adopters. Key features include:
• Revolutionary EasyLeap™ System: Advanced 40mm* obstacle crossing with two main wheels and two auxiliary wheels for seamless navigation over thresholds and obstacles
• HyperStream™ Detangling DuoBrush and Dual Flex Arm Technology: Advanced dual-brush system with SideReach™ vacuuming and MopExtend™ RoboSwing technology for comprehensive edge and corner coverage
• 8-in-1 PowerDock™ with AceClean DryBoard™: Delivers fully automated cleaning with the AceClean™ DryBoard for minimized water residue, four-temperature mop washing, auto-emptying for up to 100 days, and 30% faster charging

* 40mm refers to the height of a double-layer step where the gap between the two layers exceeds 3cm. For a single-layer step, the maximum height is 22mm. Based on in-house lab data.
summary: Dreame Technology has launched the L40s Robot Vacuum Series, a three-model line of robot vacuums designed to provide advanced cleaning technology to every household regardless of budget. The new lineup offers professional-grade performance to match any budget and ensures the best cleaning possible for all. The company is also committed to strengthening its presence in the US market with innovative solutions tailored to American consumers' needs. The L40's Series features graduated technology tiers, with one offering industry-leading 19,000Pa Vormax™ suction for tech-savvy users and smart home adopters. Key features include an EasyLeap™ System, an AceClean DryBoard for minimized water residue, four-temperature mop washing, auto-emptying for up to 100 days, and 30% faster charging.
shortSummary: Dreame Technology launched the L40s Robot Vacuum Series, offering professional-grade performance to every household, including tech enthusiasts and tech adopters.

Frequently Asked Questions
Q: What’s the difference between L40s Ultra, L40s Ultra AE, and L40s Ultra CE models?
A: L40s Ultra offers maximum features including 40mm obstacle crossing,
extending side brush, mop removal, and AceClean™ DryBoard. L40s Ultra
AE provides the same 19,000Pa suction with dual brush flexibility and
multi-spectral dirt detection. L40s Ultra CE delivers 13,000Pa suction with
core smart features at an entry-level price.
Q: Do Dreame L40s robot vacuums work well for pet hair?
A: Yes. All models feature anti-tangle brush technology - HyperStream™
DuoBrush (L40s Ultra), TriCut™ 3.0 (AE), or TriCut™ brush (CE) that automatically
cut and collect pet hair without clogging.
Q: Do Dreame L40s robot vacuums work well for pet hair?
A: Yes. All models feature anti-tangle brush technology - HyperStream™
DuoBrush (L40s Ultra), TriCut™ 3.0 (AE), or TriCut™ brush (CE) that
automatically cut and collect pet hair without clogging.
Q: How long does the battery last on L40 series robots?
A: All L40s models have 5,200mAh batteries providing up to 260 minutes of
cleaning
time. They also feature 30% faster charging compared to previous
Dreame models.
Q: Can these robot vacuums clean different carpet types?
A: Yes. All models automatically detect carpets and adjust suction power.
They lift mops up to 10.5mm to keep carpets dry during vacuuming. The
Ultra model can completely remove mops for long-pile carpets.
Q: How often do I need to empty the dust bag?
A: The 3.2L dust bag provides up to 100 days of hands-free operation before
needing replacement, based on average home cleaning.
Q: Do L40s robots work with Alexa and Google Assistant?
A: Yes, all models support voice control through Alexa, Google Assistant,
and direct voice commands to the robot.
Q: What's the suction power?
A: L40s Ultra and L40 Ultra AE deliver 19,000Pa Vormax™ suction, while L40 Ultra
CE
provides 13,000Pa.

argos_summary: Dreame Technology has launched the L40s Series, a lineup of three robot vacuums designed to provide professional-grade cleaning performance for various budgets. The models—L40s Ultra, L40s Ultra AE, and L40s Ultra CE—feature advanced technologies such as high suction power, intelligent navigation, and automated maintenance capabilities. This initiative aims to cater to the growing demand for innovative cleaning solutions in the U.S. market, ensuring that high-quality cleaning technology is accessible to all consumers.
